name: Star Rail
description:
If you ever played Sky Roads you may find this game a refreshing nostalgic experience. Jump across procedurally generated platforms, avoid obstacles, and collect powerups to fuel your way towards the jump gate at the end of each level.

Credits:

Nebula background by Chris DeLeon - gamkedo.com chrisdeleon.com

Music by Tracman Productions https://soundcloud.com/royalteefreeinstrumentals

Community testing support by reddit.com/r/hobbygamedev
